scripts.clearBuild: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && mkdir build/images && mkdir build/images/dist && mkdir build/fonts && mkdir build/js
scripts.copyAssets: cp -R images/dist/ build/images/dist && cp -R fonts/ build/fonts && cp -R js/ build/js
scripts.copyFiles: cp *.html build/ && cp style.css build/ && cp *.json build/ && cp *.js build/
scripts.build: gulp sass && gulp js && gulp images && npm run clearBuild && npm run copyAssets && npm run copyFiles && npm run copyServer
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && now && now alias
